select u.id as userId, u.user_name, e.title as examTitle, ues.limit_time, ues.exam_id, case ues.whether_mark when 1 then '是' when 0 then '否' end as corrected from t_user_exams_score as ues left join t_user as u on ues.user_id = u.id left join t_exam as e on ues.exam_id = e.id where ues.exam_id = #{examId} and ues.whether_mark = 0
